{

"domainName": "aero-db",

"scalingCount": 0,
"resourcePool": "acmefin.resourcepool.kubernetespoolprod",
"configuration": [
"acmefin.configuration.mongodbgenric"
],
"secrets": [

"secret": "acmefin.vault.mongo_root_password",
"name": "MONGO_ROOT_PASSWORD"
},
{

"name": "MONGODB_PASSWORD"
}
],

}
}
]
}

{
"name": "Amazon Mysql l1",

"status": "Published",

"environment": "acmecorp.environment.development",
"services": [
{

"appService": "finance.app.forex.service.forexservice",
"domainName": "mysql",
"dependency": "",
"scalingCount": 0,
"resourcePool": "finance.resourcepool.fintechcorpeast1services",
"stacks": {
"stack": "finance.catalog.stack.amazonmysqlservicedb",
"parameters": {
"db_password": {
"vaultName": "Aws_MySql_Vault"
},
"disk_size": "10",
"instance_class": "db.t2.small",
"instance_identifier": "eastcorpdsql",
"db_username": "awssqldbrds",
"instance_name": "mysqldbrds",
"skip_final_snapshot": "true"
}
}
}
]
}

{
"status": "Published",
"osVersion": "7",
"name": "CentOS 7 x86_64",
"description": "CentOS 7 x86_64 Instance with latest updates",
"osName": "Cent OS",
"logo": "data:image/png;base64,",
"osFamily": "LINUX",
"adminuser": "centos",
"rootDisk": "10",
"productDescription": "<section id=\"product-attributes\" class=\"attributes\" style=\"word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><div class=\"row\" id=\"highlights\"><p class=\"col-xs-4\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; width: 186.656px; font-weight: 700; text-align: right;\">Highlights</p><ul class=\"col-xs-8\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; width: 373.328px; list-style: square; color: rgb(238, 119, 17);\"><li><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">All official CentOS Linux images are built with SELINUX set to enforcing mode. However, we test the images with both Selinux enabled as well as permissive.</span></li><li><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">This image is built to allow remote ssh login only as 'root' user with the key specified at instance launch time.</span></li><li><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">We recommend reviewing the CentOS on AWS Cloud wiki page at http://wiki.centos.org/Cloud/AWS for details on how these images are built, how you might be able to extend and add functionality to these images as well as Getting Started guides.</span></li></ul></div><hr style=\"margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; border-top-width: 0.1rem; border-top-color: rgb(204, 204, 204);\"></section><section id=\"prod-description\" style=\"word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><h2 id=\"product-description\" style=\"font-weight: 700; font-size: 1.8rem;\">Product Description</h2><p style=\"margin-bottom: 0px;\">This is the Official CentOS 6 x86_64 HVM image that has been built with a minimal profile. The image contains just enough packages to run within AWS, bring up an SSH Server and allow users to login. If you intend to run CentOS-6/x86_64 images, this one is recommended. CentOS.org intends to keep these images updated based on security fixes and newer point releases.</p></section><section id=\"product-details\" style=\"word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><h2 style=\"font-weight: 700; font-size: 1.8rem;\">Product Details</h2><ul style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; list-style: none;\"><li><span style=\"font-weight: 700;\">Version:</span> 1602</li></ul></section>",
"imageCodes": [
{
"code": "OpenLogic:CentOS:7.3:latest",
"provider": "acmecorp.provider.microsoftazure",
"region": "acmecorp.region.azureuseast"
},
{
"code": "ami-fa2df395",
"provider": "acmecorp.provider.amazonwebservices",
"region": "acmecorp.region.awsuseastn-virginia"
}
]
}
